# Linq Docs

- [LINQ to SQL](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/index.md): LINQ to SQL is a component of the .NET Framework that provides a runtime infrastructure for managing relational data as objects.
- [Samples](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/samples.md): Learn more about: Samples

## Aggregate Queries

- [Aggregate Queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/aggregate-queries.md): Learn more about: Aggregate Queries
- [Return the Average Value From a Numeric Sequence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/return-the-average-value-from-a-numeric-sequence.md): Learn more about: Return the Average Value From a Numeric Sequence
- [Count the Number of Elements in a Sequence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/count-the-number-of-elements-in-a-sequence.md): Learn more about: Count the Number of Elements in a Sequence
- [Find the Maximum Value in a Numeric Sequence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/find-the-maximum-value-in-a-numeric-sequence.md): Learn more about: Find the Maximum Value in a Numeric Sequence
- [Find the Minimum Value in a Numeric Sequence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/find-the-minimum-value-in-a-numeric-sequence.md): Learn more about: Find the Minimum Value in a Numeric Sequence
- [Compute the Sum of Values in a Numeric Sequence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/compute-the-sum-of-values-in-a-numeric-sequence.md): Learn more about: Compute the Sum of Values in a Numeric Sequence

- [Optimistic Concurrency: Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/optimistic-concurrency-overview.md): Learn more about: Optimistic Concurrency: Overview
- [Retrieving Objects from the Identity Cache](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/retrieving-objects-from-the-identity-cache.md): Learn more about: Retrieving Objects from the Identity Cache
- [Security in LINQ to SQL](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/security-in-linq-to-sql.md): Learn more about: Security in LINQ to SQL
- [Serialization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/serialization.md): Learn more about serialization in LINQ to SQL
- [Transaction Support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/transaction-support.md): Learn more about: Transaction Support
- [SQL-CLR Type Mismatches](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mismatches.md): Learn more about: SQL-CLR Type Mismatches

## Communicating with the Database

- [Communicating with the Database](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/communicating-with-the-database.md): Learn more about: Communicating with the Database
- [How to: Connect to a Database](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-connect-to-a-database.md): Learn how to use DataContext to connect to a database in LINQ to SQL. Refer to these examples to use DataContext to connect to a database and to get rows.
- [How to: Directly Execute SQL Commands](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-directly-execute-sql-commands.md): Learn more about: How to: Directly Execute SQL Commands
- [How to: Reuse a Connection Between an ADO.NET Command and a DataContext](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-reuse-a-connection-between-an-ado-net-command-and-a-datacontext.md): Learn more about: How to: Reuse a Connection Between an ADO.NET Command and a DataContext

## Creating the Object Model

- [Creating the Object Model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/creating-the-object-model.md): Learn more about: Creating the Object Model
- [How to: Generate the Object Model in Visual Basic or C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-generate-the-object-model-in-visual-basic-or-csharp.md): Learn more about: How to: Generate the Object Model in Visual Basic or C#
- [How to: Generate the Object Model as an External File](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-generate-the-object-model-as-an-external-file.md): Learn more about: How to: Generate the Object Model as an External File
- [How to: Generate Customized Code by Modifying a DBML File](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-generate-customized-code-by-modifying-a-dbml-file.md): Learn more about: How to: Generate Customized Code by Modifying a DBML File
- [How to: Validate DBML and External Mapping Files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-validate-dbml-and-external-mapping-files.md): Learn more about: How to: Validate DBML and External Mapping Files
- [How to: Make Entities Serializable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/how-to-make-entities-serializable.md): Learn more about: How to: Make Entities Serializable
